Translations.Text: Alloh savgand jod mekunad ʙa osmon va sitorae, ki saʙonagoh pajdo mesavad
Va tu ci doni, ki sitorae, ki dar saʙ pajdo mesavad, ci hast
Sitorai duraxsone hast, ki torikii saʙro mesikofad
Kase vucud nadorad, magar ki ʙar u faristae vakil karda sudaast ʙaroi navistani amalhoi u
Pas odami, ki ruzi az nav zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidanro inkor mekunad, ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarida sudaast
Az oʙi manii cahandai nociz ofarida sudaast
ki az mijoni ustuxoni pusti mard va ustuxoni sinai zan ʙerun meojad
Begumon, Alloh ʙa ʙozofarinisi u tavonost
ruze, ki rozhoi nihon oskor mesavand. Va amali soleh az amali fosid cudo megardad
Ongoh uro tavonoi va jovare naʙosad
Savgand ʙa osmoni ʙozʙoranda
Savgand ʙa zamine, ki dar on sikofiho hast az onho gijohho merujand
Begumon, Qur'on suxani ravsan va cudokunandai haq az ʙotil ast
Va on hazl nest
Begumon, onone ki pajomʙar sallalllohu alajhi va sallamro ʙovar namekunand hilae meandesand, to Qur'on va rasulro duruƣ ʙarorand va ʙotili xudro ta'jid namojand
Va Man niz corae meandesam, to haqro nusrat diham, agarci kofironro nopisand ojad
Pas kofironro muxlat deh, andak muxlatason deh! Va dar furud omadani azoʙ ʙa onho sitoʙ makun
Nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgi xudro ʙa poki jod kun, cunon ki loiqi ʙuzurgii Ust
on Zote, ki ofarid maxluqotro va ustuvor dost
Va on Zote, ki andoza mu'ajjan kard. Sipas hama xalqro ʙa on ci munosiʙ mesavand, roh namud
Va on Zote, ki carogohhoro rujonid
sipas xusku sijoh gardonid
Mo Qur'onro ʙaroi tu ej Rasul xohem xond va tu digar onro faromus naxohi kard
ƣajri on ci Alloh ʙixohad, hamono U oskoru pinhonro medonad
Va dar kori tu va dar hamai umuri dini va dunjavie, ki ʙa tu ru menamojad, osoni padid meovarem
Ej Rasul, agar ʙa qavmat pand dodanat foida kunad, pand deh. Xudro azoʙ madeh dar pand dodani saxse, ki sarkasi mekunad
Har kase, ki az Alloh metarsad, ʙa zudi pand xohad paziruft
Va ʙadʙaxttarin fard az on pand duri xohad guzid
Hamon kas, ki dar otasi ʙuzurgi cahannam daraftad
Ongoh dar on co na ʙimirad, ki rohat joʙad va na zinda mesavad, ki foida ʙinad
Ba durusti, kase ki xudro pokiza dost, nacot joft
Va rastagor sud, har ki nomi Parvardigori xudro ʙar zaʙon ovard va ʙaroi rizogii U namoz guzorid
